FuncDef:
The link-protocol transport lacp command configures an interface to transparently transmit LACP packets.
The undo link-protocol transport lacp command deletes the type of link-layer-protocol packets that can be transparently transmitted by an interface.
By default, an interface cannot transparently transmit LACP packets.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, main interfaces bound to VLANs, EVPN or VSIs instances drop LACP packets. If you want these interfaces to transparently transmit LACP packets, run the link-protocol transport lacp command.
Precautions
This command applies only to main interfaces bound to VLANs, EVPN or VSIs instances. In addition, the link-protocol transport lacp and mode lacp-static commands cannot be used together.
